Posts.Content: carolyn2 wrote: hi im carolyn and in jan of 2009 my family doctor found lumps and sent me for an ultra sound but after further testing reveald iu might have breast cancer as my opther symptoms fit in biopsy was done but i had to constently fight him because of the fact i have an intellectual disability and he has turned recently quite biased torwards me as i got worse i am seeing a surgeon but i have the following symptoms bleeding from both breasts and rash and bruising he told me i was doing this myself and called me crazy and wouldnt give me referals for ultrasounds or other tests or even an mri shortness of breath and today i went for a walk and nearly collapsed because i was so exhausted i saw a surgeon he found thickening of the skin on the mamogram had trouble withthe mamogram because my breasts are not devloped properly also because of my mental illness depression he made a biased judgement Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: hi my story is carolyn2 Faith316
